scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:server
scripts.build:frontend: npm --prefix frontend ci && npm --prefix frontend run build && rm -rf obake-uketuke-app/public && mkdir -p obake-uketuke-app/public && cp -R frontend/dist/* obake-uketuke-app/public/
scripts.build:server: npm --prefix obake-uketuke-app ci && npm --prefix obake-uketuke-app run build
